verbs.description: [ARG0: Allen] [V: has] [ARG1: a golden opportunity to leap off of the success of ' Roseanne ' by taking on current events in the age of Trump in a way that no other show has] .
[ARG0: Allen] has a golden opportunity to [V: leap] [ARG1: off of the success of ' Roseanne '] [ARGM-MNR: by taking on current events in the age of Trump in a way that no other show has] .
Allen has a golden opportunity to leap off of the success of ' Roseanne ' by [V: taking] on [ARG1: current events in the age of Trump] [ARGM-MNR: in a way that no other show has] .
Allen has a golden opportunity to leap off of the success of ' Roseanne ' by taking on current events in the age of Trump in [ARG1: a way] [R-ARG1: that] [ARG0: no] other show [V: has] .
